title: Yoga from Early Classes
description: Weekly yoga sessions are conducted from lower classes to build discipline, focus, and physical health.

title: Computer Education from Class 1
description: We introduce computer learning from Class 1 to build digital literacy early on.

title: No Re-admission Hassle
description: We believe in continuous learning; hence, we do not require students to re-apply every year.

title: Individual Attention to Weak Students
description: We provide special academic support to students who need extra help, with personalized guidance and follow-up.

title: Maximum 30 Students per Class
description: Each classroom is limited to 30 students to ensure personal attention and better engagement.

title: Foundational Moral & Cultural Education
description: Students are exposed to moral values and cultural programs to build character and confidence.

title: Transport Facility Available
description: Transport facility is available for students across nearby areas.
